Audio.Locality: Serra do Mar State Park. Picinguaba
Audio.Author: Antonio Silveira
Audio.Comments: Perhaps the first record for the region. We were accompanied for biologist Fabio Olmos. See note in http://www.aultimaarcadenoe.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/Thamnophilus_palliatus1.pdfbird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
